description:
You're struggling with converting leads into customers.

You know you have great products and services; however, no one is clicking the "buy" button.

It happens ... we've all been there.

More often than not, it's because the lead doesn't know you, your business, nor the products and services you offer.

The Problem? There's no relationship.

Great news! You can build a relationship, automatically, with a top converting email series!

In this course, I walk you, step-by-step with how to setup a top converting email series for your business by using ActiveCampaign.

The course covers two types of email series - Multi Product and One Product.

  • Multi Product - Normally, this includes brick and mortar businesses and eCommerce businesses. You know, the businesses with multiple products
  • One Product - Normally, this is for digital products like courses and eBooks where the business offers one main product or service
No matter your business model - this course has you covered!This is a beginner level course that is broken down into simple, easy to follow steps ... and, if questions arise ... I'm here to help guide you in the right direction!By the end of this course you will have a top converting email series for your business!
title: How to Build a Top Converting Email Series w/ ActiveCampaign
